dataset_info.name: Understat Football Player Statistics
dataset_info.description: Real-world player performance statistics from Understat. Contains current season data for Top 5 European leagues with expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), and advanced metrics.

columns.position: Primary position abbreviation (D=Defender, M=Midfielder, F=Forward, S=Sub)
columns.matches: Matches played - total appearances in the season
columns.minutes: Total minutes played in the season
columns.xg: Expected Goals (xG) - statistical measure of shot quality
columns.np_xg: Non-penalty xG - expected goals excluding penalties
columns.xa: Expected Assists (xA) - quality of chances created for teammates
columns.key_passes: Key passes - passes that lead directly to a shot
columns.xg_chain: xG Chain - total xG of possessions player was involved in
columns.xg_buildup: xG Buildup - xG of possessions player was involved in (excluding shots and assists)
